title: Complete Report
description: Finish the quarterly report for the team meeting.

title: Prepare Presentation
description: Create a presentation for the upcoming client meeting.

title: Fix Critical Bug
description: Address and resolve the critical bug reported by the QA team.

title: Review Code
description: Conduct a code review for the recent feature implementation.

title: Update Documentation
description: Revise and update the project documentation.

title: Emergency Server Maintenance
description: Perform urgent maintenance on the production server to address performance issues.
